Item 8.01 - Other Events.content: On November 12, 2021, Johnson & Johnson (the “Company”) issued a press release announcing its intent to separate the Company's Consumer Health business. A copy of the Company's press release is attached to this Current Report on Form 8-K as Exhibit 99.1.
